constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 26 (Thursday, February 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. GARCIA of Texas:
H.R. 987.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H502]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

title: To establish a grant program for domestic maritime workforce training and education, and for other purposes.
